name: DaDa Dash
description:
- Trigger Warning: Motion Sickness

- For Brackeys 2021 Game Jam! - https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-6

- Movement Keys - WASD for Player 2 and Arrow Keys for Player 1!

- Which one is up/down/left/right changes at random intervals (Every 30 to 60 seconds).

- Race your friends and see who can adapt better to the chaos!

- Credits:

- Andy Smithwick - Programmer

- Julia Heatherly - Artist 

- Aizellah Sorra - Artist

- Tyler Nash - Music Design 

- Matthew Hui - Music Design / UI

- Ricky Beal - Level Designer / Play Tester 

- DONT FULLSCREEN IF YOU WANT YOUR FRAMES
- Check out other games made by The Forge! https://itch.io/profile/theforge
